quotes.quote: You must live in the present, launch yourself on every wave, find your eternity in each moment.
Real generosity towards the future lies in giving all to the present.
The future is no more uncertain than the present.
The present is a great treasure, live in the present.
Nothing is worth more than this day.
Stay present, stay conscious.
Begin at once to live, and count each separate day as a separate life.
We know nothing of tomorrow; our business is to be good and happy today.
The present is the ever moving shadow that divides yesterday from tomorrow. In that lies hope.
In order for the light to shine so brightly, the darkness must be present.
Few of us ever live in the present. We are forever anticipating what is to come or remembering what has gone.
There is no distance on this earth as far away as yesterday.
Present opportunities are not to be neglected; they rarely visit us twice.
Realize deeply that the present moment is all you ever have. Make the Now the primary focus of your life.
It is said that the present is pregnant with the future.
Do not let your shadow walk you. You are not a slave of the past.
The present eye praises the present object.
Future indifferences is no consolation for present pain.
Your present circumstances don't determine where you can go; they merely determine where you start.
Be present and in the moment.
The present is an eternal now.
The present changes the past. Looking back you do not find what you left behind.
The future influences the present just as much as the past.
The present grows within the boundaries of the past.
If you want the present to be different from the past, study the past.
There was only present, and it was infinite. The past and the future were just blinders we wore so that infinity wouldn't drive us mad.
The ability to be in the present moment is a major component of mental wellness.
Being fully present is the best guarantee for a bright future.
There's no present. There's only the immediate future and the recent past.
Nothing is more precious than being in the present moment. Fully alive, fully aware.
